version_description:
- Select as many videos as you want from your camera roll
- Reverse your videos
- No crop for Instagram
- Crop it to full screen, square or 9:16
- Share it (Instagram Stories unique feature - we split your video into 15 second clips to post on Instagram Stories)
- Bug fixes.

- Select as many videos as you want from your camera roll
- Reverse your videos
- No crop for Instagram
- Crop it to full screen, square or 9:16
- Share it (Instagram Stories unique feature - we split your video into 15 second clips to post on Instagram Stories)
- Bug fixes.

- Reverse your videos

- Share it (Instagram Stories unique feature - we split your video into 15 second clips to post on Instagram Stories)

- Select as many videos as you want from your camera roll
- Reverse your videos
- No crop for Instagram
- Crop it to full screen, square or 9:16
- Share it (Instagram Stories unique feature - we split your video into 15 second clips to post on Instagram Stories)
- Bug fixes.

- New recording mode: hands free. Now you can record your videos without having to hold the record button, just by tapping It!
- improved FB and YouTube sharing
- stability improvements
- bug fixes

- New recording mode: hands free. Now you can record your videos without having to hold the record button, just by tapping It!
- improved FB and YouTube sharing
- stability improvements
- bug fixes

- stability improvements
- bug fixes

- stability improvements
- bug fixes

We’ve been busy building awesome stuffs for you and we are excited to introduce:
- Speed: now you can change the speed of your video to make it even more cooler.
- Rotate: put your video upside down and make your friends say wow!
- Landscape mode: edit your videos in a whole new way. Perfect for iPad!
- Trimming: We've improved trimming. Now you can trim your videos in detail!
- Smaller watermark: you ask it and we did it.
- iOS exclusive technology on! Haptik feedback (enhances music and video trimming) and Peek and Pop (access Camera, Camera Roll or a saved Project directly from your iPhones home screen)
- stability improvements
- bug fixes

We’ve been busy building awesome stuffs for you and we are excited to introduce:
- Speed: now you can change the speed of your video to make it even more cooler.
- Rotate: put your video upside down and make your friends say wow!
- Landscape mode: edit your videos in a whole new way. Perfect for iPad!
- Trimming: We've improved trimming. Now you can trim your videos in detail!
- Smaller watermark: you ask it and we did it.
- iOS exclusive technology on! Haptik feedback (enhances music and video trimming) and Peek and Pop (access Camera, Camera Roll or a saved Project directly from your iPhones home screen)
- stability improvements
- bug fixes

Check this out, we have some really cool stuff : )
- Whole new design, your editing experience just got better!
- Audio: mix the music volume with the ambient volume
- Split: use it to cut the part of the video that you want

Check this out, we have some really cool stuff : )
- Whole new design, your editing experience just got better!
- Audio: mix the music volume with the ambient volume
- Split: use it to cut the part of the video that you want

- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes

- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes

Check this out, we have some really cool stuff : )
- Introducing Filmr Toys! Edit your videos with awesome characters like Unicorn, ET, Dwarf and more! Bring Augmented Reality to life! (From iPhone 6S onwards with iOS 11)
- Really cool new iOS 11 features for iPad: Drag and Drop and Multitasking
- No video crop: format feature just got better!
- Whole new design, your editing experience just got better!
- Zoom: pinch to choose the best frame

- New Christmas AR! Make awesome videos with the break dance Santa Claus and the crazy Snowman!
- Transitions are here! Try it out!
- New formats- 4:3 (perfect for GoPro) and 4:5 (fits Instagram post)
- Great stability improvements

- New Christmas AR! Make awesome videos with the break dance Santa Claus and the crazy Snowman!
- Transitions are here! Try it out!
- New formats- 4:3 (perfect for GoPro) and 4:5 (fits Instagram post)
- Great stability improvements

We been busy creating awesome stuffs for you : )
- New Filmr Toys are here! Create with the love ARmoji and the paper man!
- All new volume controls, choose the part of the video you want to put music on!
- Fixed a bug that didn't let you record with the Filmr Toys
- Great stability improvements

We been busy creating awesome stuffs for you : )
- New Filmr Toys are here! Create with the love ARmoji and the paper man!
- All new volume controls, choose the part of the video you want to put music on!
- Fixed a bug that didn't let you record with the Filmr Toys
- Great stability improvements

We reached 1 million users and prepared awesome stuffs for you! High quality Film filters, handcrafted fonts, creative transitions, new Filmr Toys and 1080p video export option just dropped in, check it out! Now you can save your Projects!

We've been creating cool stuff for you : )
New iOS 12 experiences!
- Create with dope patterns (iPhone 7 plus, iPhone 8 plus, iPhone X)
- Play Frisbee with a friend in the real world with augmented reality! (iPhone 6S onward including iPhone SE and iPad Pro (9.7, 10.5 or 12.9) – both first-gen and 2nd-gen; and iPad (2017))

- Persistence: scan a surface in the AR camera and get back to this same session even if you exit Filmr
- Fixed a bug where suddenly the screen turns black; and another one where users were unable to save their video

We've been creating cool stuff for you : )
New iOS 12 experiences!
- Create with dope patterns (iPhone 7 plus, iPhone 8 plus, iPhone X)
- Play Frisbee with a friend in the real world with augmented reality! (iPhone 6S onward including iPhone SE and iPad Pro (9.7, 10.5 or 12.9) – both first-gen and 2nd-gen; and iPad (2017))

- Persistence: scan a surface in the AR camera and get back to this same session even if you exit Filmr
- Fixed a bug where suddenly the screen turns black; and another one where users were unable to save their video

我们很高兴告诉您我们一直在努力做的事！
- 令人惊讶的视频效果，如VHS, Glitch和RGB！
- 选择从亮到暗模式设计，这取决于您！
- 邀请您所有的朋友，并获取免费的Filmr Pro与我们精彩的推荐计划！
- 圣诞图案（ios12版iPhone X）
- 用框架裁剪不同形状的视频！
- 流畅的切换以及更多的过滤器！
- 当您将照片添加到项目中时，请选择它将在视频中播放的秒数
- 速度提高3倍以上
- 我们减少了水印
- 修复了iPhone XS Max不能保存视频的漏洞

在filmer尽情享受

We are excited to tell you all about what we've been working on!
- Amazing video effects like VHS, Glitch and RGB!
- Choose from light to dark mode design, it's up to you!
- Invite all your friends and get Filmr Pro for free with the our amazing referral program!
- Christmas patterns (iPhone X onward with iOS 12)
- Crop your videos in different shapes with Frames!
- Cool transitions and even more filters!
- Fixed a bug where users weren't able to save their videos using iPhone XS Max

Enjoy Filmrs : )

Hey, Filmrs!

We are really excited to announce some amazing features we've been working on!

- Multicam: shoot with your front and back cameras simultaneously
- Dark Mode: apply the mode that is set on your phone
- People Occlusion: now AR characters are even more real

Enjoy!

Check out our Instagram @filmr.app!
